int main()
{
	long long int test,x1,y1,x2,y2,x3,y3,x4,y4,x5,y5,x6,y6,area;
	cin>>test;
	while(test--)
	{
		cin>>x1>>y1>>x2>>y2>>x3>>y3>>x4>>y4;
		x5=max(x1,x3);
		y5=max(y1,y3);
		x6=min(x2,x4);
		y6=min(y2,y4);
		if(x5<x6 && y5<y6)
		area=(x2-x1)*(y2-y1)+(x4-x3)*(y4-y3)-(x6-x5)*(y6-y5);
		else
		area=(x2-x1)*(y2-y1)+(x4-x3)*(y4-y3);
		cout<<area<<"\n";
	}
	
	return 0;
}
